sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import Input from '../../components/ui/Input'; import Modal from '../../components/ui/Modal'; import Badge from '../../components/ui/Badge'; import { Users, Plus, Search, Filter, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Mail, Phone, Calendar, User, } from 'lucide-react'; const ApplicantsPage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedApplicant, setSelectedApplicant] = useState(null); const [isDetailModalOpen, setIsDetailModalOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddModalOpen, setIsAddModalOpen] = useState(false); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('profile'); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const applicants = [ { id: 1, firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1234567890', applicationsCount: 3, registrationDate: '2024-01-15', status: 'active', profile: { dateOfBirth: '1995-05-15', gender: 'male', nationality: 'American', address: '123 Main St, New York, NY 10001', }, education: [ { degree: 'Bachelor', institution: 'University of California', graduationYear: 2018, gpa: 3.8, major: 'Computer Science', }, ], applications: [ { id: 1, type: 'job', title: 'Software Engineer', company: 'Google', status: 'submitted', date: '2024-01-20', }, { id: 2, type: 'scholarship', title: 'MBA Scholarship', university: 'Harvard', status: 'in_review', date: '2024-01-18', }, ], documents: [ { id: 1, name: 'Resume.pdf', type: 'resume', uploadDate: '2024-01-15', size: '2.3 MB', }, { id: 2, name: 'Transcript.pdf', type: 'transcript', uploadDate: '2024-01-16', size: '1.8 MB', }, ], }, { id: 2, firstName: 'Jane', lastName: 'Smith', email: 'jane.smith@example.com', phone: '+1234567891', applicationsCount: 2, registrationDate: '2024-01-10', status: 'active', profile: { dateOfBirth: '1996-08-22', gender: 'female', nationality: 'Canadian', address: '456 Oak Ave, Toronto, ON M5V 3A8', }, education: [ { degree: 'Master', institution: 'University of Toronto', graduationYear: 2020, gpa: 3.9, major: 'Business Administration', }, ], applications: [ { id: 3, type: 'scholarship', title: 'PhD Scholarship', university: 'MIT', status: 'draft', date: '2024-01-22', }, ], documents: [ { id: 3, name: 'CV.pdf', type: 'resume', uploadDate: '2024-01-10', size: '1.5 MB', }, ], }, ]; const filteredApplicants = applicants.filter( (applicant) => applicant.firstName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || applicant.lastName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || applicant.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleViewDetails = (applicant) => { setSelectedApplicant(applicant); setIsDetailModalOpen(true); }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { active: 'success', inactive: 'secondary', pending: 'warning', }; return {status}; }; const getApplicationStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { submitted: 'primary', in_review: 'warning', approved: 'success', rejected: 'danger', draft: 'secondary', }; return {status.replace('_', ' ')}; }; return (
{/* Header */}

Applicants

Manage and view all applicant profiles and applications.

{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10" />
{/* Applicants Table */} Applicants ({filteredApplicants.length})
{filteredApplicants.map((applicant) => ( ))}
Name Contact Applications Status Registered Actions
{applicant.firstName} {applicant.lastName}
ID: {applicant.id}
{applicant.email}
{applicant.phone}
{applicant.applicationsCount} applications
{getStatusBadge(applicant.status)} {new Date(applicant.registrationDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Applicant Detail Modal */} setIsDetailModalOpen(false)} title={`${selectedApplicant?.firstName} ${selectedApplicant?.lastName}`} size="xl" > {selectedApplicant && (
{/* Tabs */}
{['profile', 'applications', 'documents'].map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */} {activeTab === 'profile' && (

{selectedApplicant.firstName}

{selectedApplicant.lastName}

{selectedApplicant.email}

{selectedApplicant.phone}

{selectedApplicant.profile?.dateOfBirth}

{selectedApplicant.profile?.gender}

{selectedApplicant.profile?.nationality}

{selectedApplicant.profile?.address}

{/* Education */}

Education

{selectedApplicant.education?.map((edu, index) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}

{edu.graduationYear}

{edu.gpa}

{edu.major}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'applications' && (

Applications

{selectedApplicant.applications?.map((app) => (
{app.title}

{app.company || app.university}

{new Date(app.date).toLocaleDateString()}

{getApplicationStatusBadge(app.status)}
))}
)} {activeTab === 'documents' && (

Documents

{selectedApplicant.documents?.map((doc) => (
{doc.name}

Type: {doc.type} | Size: {doc.size}

Uploaded: {new Date(doc.uploadDate).toLocaleDateString()}

))}
)}
)} {/* Add Applicant Modal - Placeholder */} setIsAddModalOpen(false)} title="Add New Applicant" size="lg" >

Add applicant functionality would be implemented here with a multi-step form.

); }; export default ApplicantsPage;
